mapper.select: select lre.PARENT_ID from l_user_role lur left join l_role lr on lur.ROLE_ID = lr.ID left join l_role_resource lrr on lr.ID = lrr.ROLE_ID left join l_resource lre on lrr.RESOURCE_ID = lre.ID where lur.IS_DELETE = 0 and lur.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lr.IS_DELETE = 0 and lr.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lrr.IS_DELETE = 0 and lrr.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lre.IS_DELETE = 0 and lre.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lre.PARENT_ID is not null and lur.USER_ID = #{userId}

select lr.ID as resourceId, lcp.ID as parentId, lcp.PERIOD_NUMBER as periodName from l_role_resource lrr left join l_resource lr on lrr.RESOURCE_ID = lr.ID left join l_community_period lcp on lr.PARENT_ID = lcp.ID where lrr.IS_DELETE = 0 and lrr.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lr.IS_DELETE = 0 and lr.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lcp.IS_DELETE = 0 and lcp.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lrr.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
